abstract: Inside Art column; Standard High Line hotel on Washington Street displays first New York outdoor installation by Jose Parla, Cuban artist based in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The pieces reflect the complex biography of Mr. Parlá, who was born in Miami to parents who had fled Cuba.

headline.main: José Parlá to Bring Sculptural Paintings to the High Line

snippet: The pieces reflect the complex biography of Mr. Parlá, who was born in Miami to parents who had fled Cuba.
